Question: During the 1990s, this person collaborated twice with Youth of Killing Joke as the musical duo "the Fireman".
Hints: The following year, he and Jackson worked on "Say Say Say", this person's most recent US number one as of 2012[update].
The soundtrack failed to chart, but it won this person an Ivor Novello Award for Best Instrumental Theme.
The score was a collaboration with Martin, who used two this person themes to write thirteen variations.
